Info.Title: The Tourist
Info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Crime, Mystery, Romance, Thriller
Info.Writer: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck (screenplay), Christopher McQuarrie (screenplay), Julian Fellowes (screenplay), Jérôme Salle (motion picture "Anthony Zimmer")
Info.Actors: Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie, Paul Bettany, Timothy Dalton
Info.Plot: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 4 wins & 1 nomination.
